channel.title: Help me with weapons
channel.description: Sorry but I couldn't find a tutorial, maybe I miss read some, but on my server some weapons are held wrong. If you hold it looks like your holding it over your shoulder. If you use for instance certain barrows items it doesn't look right, like the flail is stuck up in the air, if you hold torags hammer one hammer gos up to your shoulder...If you hold the guthans spear it holds like a 2 hander, so does the dragon hally. Maybe even more..help please?

item.title: Help me with weapons
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

Br3ndan theres no errors, its compiled and all. it just doesn’t work. and whats that about the right hand? thats probably the error. More info please[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 08:52:25 AM[/size][hr]Bump?

Read full topic

There is a file in your source and you switch the numbers to the right hand

item.title: Help me with weapons

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

You need to compile. If you have errors, post them. You can’t compile a .Java file if it has errors, well you can but the ‘update’ won’t take place.

item.title: Help me with weapons
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Replace everything underneath

public int GetStandAnim(int id) {

with this

if(id == 4718) // dharoks axe { return 2065; } if(id == 1305) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 6563) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 6562) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 4726) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 6526) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 4710) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 4675) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 4170) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 3054) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 3053) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1409) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1407) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1405) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1403) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1401) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1399) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1397) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1395) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1393) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1391) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1389) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1387) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1385) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1383) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1381) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 1379) // staff { return 809; } if(id == 4755) // veracs flail { return 2061; } if(id == 4734) // karils x bow { return 2074; } if(id == 4153) // maul { return 1662; } if(id == 4565) // basket of eggs :) { return 1836;

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with weapons
item.dc:creator: @Wreckaz Wreckaz
item.description:
@Wreckaz wrote:

serach for

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

find veracs flail item id , it should look like this or similar

if(id == 4755) { return 2061; }
then change the number after return to the right holding emote
